subordinate.translation[0].definitions[0: in a less important position than someone else
subordinate.translation[0].definitions[1: These aims were subordinate to the main aims of the mission.
subordinate.translation[1].definitions[0: someone who has a lower position and less authority than someone else in an organization
subordinate.translation[2].definitions[0: to put someone or something in a less important position
Why subordinate your wishes to those of your family?
subordinate.translation[3].definitions[0: less important or powerful than something or someone
a subordinate role on the committee
a commission that is subordinate to the Security Council
subordinate.translation[4].definitions[0: someone who has a lower position and less authority than someone else in an organization
Supervisors are regularly evaluated by their subordinates.
